00007 ProgressBar::ProgressBar(double iMin, double iMax)
00008 {
00009   min = iMin;
00010   max = iMax;
00011   now = iMin;
00012   nowPercent = 0;
00013   
00014   width = 45;
00015   
00016   update = true;
00017 }

00024 void ProgressBar::SetNow(double iNow)
00025 {
00026   int nowPercentTmp;
00027   
00028   if (iNow >= min && iNow <= max)
00029   {
00030     now = iNow;
00031     nowPercentTmp = int((now-min)/(max-min) * 100.);
00032     if (nowPercentTmp != nowPercent)
00033     {
00034       nowPercent = nowPercentTmp;
00035       update = true;
00036     }
00037   }
00038   else
00039   {
00040     std::cerr << "ProgressBar: 'now' is out of range, " << iNow << endl;
00041   }
00042 }

00044 void ProgressBar::PrintPreliminaries()
00045 {
00046   std::cerr << "Progress: [";
00047 }
00048 
00049 void ProgressBar::PrintProgress()
00050 {
00051   if (update)
00052   {  
00053     int numDash = int(width*nowPercent/100.+0.5);
00054   
00055     cerr << "\rProgress: [";
00056     
00057     int i = 0;
00058     for (i=1;i<=numDash;i++)
00059       cerr << "|";
00060   
00061     if (numDash < width)
00062      for (i=numDash+1; i<width; i++)
00063         cerr << ".";
00064   
00065     cerr << "] ";
00066     PrintSpinner();
00067     cerr << " (" << int(nowPercent+0.5) << "%)";
00068   
00069     update = false;
00070   }
00071 }
00072 
00073 void ProgressBar::PrintSpinner()
00074 {
00075   static int num = 1;
00076   switch (num)
00077   {
00078     case 1:
00079       cerr << "|";
00080       num++;
00081       break;
00082       
00083     case 2:
00084       cerr << "/";
00085       num++;
00086       break;
00087       
00088     case 3:
00089       cerr << "-";
00090       num++;
00091       break;
00092       
00093     case 4:
00094       cerr << "\\";
00095       num = 1;
00096       break;
00097   }
00098 }
